query:
SELECT 
  id,
  smshubActivationId,
  phoneNumber,
  apiId,
  status,
  smsCode,
  createdAt,
  CASE 
    WHEN smshubActivationId = phoneNumber THEN 'INVALID_FORMAT'
    ELSE 'VALID_FORMAT'
  END as format_status
FROM activations
WHERE phoneNumber = '5521920388058'
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute

  phoneNumber,
  apiId,
  status,
  smsCode,
  createdAt,
  CASE 
    WHEN smshubActivationId = phoneNumber THEN 'INVALID_FORMAT'
    ELSE 'VALID_FORMAT'
  END as format_status
FROM activations
WHERE phoneNumber = '5521920388058'
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1;
